sqlMap.statement:
SELECT MH.GL_DT ,MH.JRNL_CATG_CD ,MD.MAN_JRNL_ENTRY_DTL_PK ,MD.COA_CMPY_CD ,MD.COA_BR_CD ,MD.COA_CC_CD ,MD.COA_ACCT_CD ,MD.COA_PROD_CD ,MD.COA_CH_CD ,MD.COA_AFFL_CD ,MD.COA_PROJ_CD ,MD.COA_EXTN_CD ,MD.DR_CR_TP_CD ,MD.JRNL_DEAL_AMT ,MD.JRNL_FUNC_AMT ,MD.DEAL_CCY_CD ,MD.MAN_JRNL_LINE_TXT ,MD.DS_ACCT_NUM ,MD.SER_NUM ,MD.JRNL_ENTRY_SRC_VAL_TXT ,JC.JRNL_CATG_NM ,JT.JRNL_ENTRY_SRC_TP_NM ,CA.COA_ACCT_DESC_TXT ,MH.MAN_JRNL_NM FROM MAN_JRNL_ENTRY_HDR MH ,MAN_JRNL_ENTRY_DTL MD ,JRNL_CATG JC ,JRNL_ENTRY_SRC_TP JT ,COA_ACCT CA WHERE MH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MH.MAN_JRNL_ENTRY_HDR_PK = #manJrnlEntryHdrPk# AND MH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND MD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MD.MAN_JRNL_ENTRY_HDR_PK = MH.MAN_JRNL_ENTRY_HDR_PK AND MD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND JC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND JC.JRNL_CATG_CD = MH.JRNL_CATG_CD AND JC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND JT.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) = #glblCmpyCd# AND JT.JRNL_ENTRY_SRC_TP_CD(+) = MD.JRNL_ENTRY_SRC_TP_CD AND JT.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0'
AND CA.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) = #glblCmpyCd# AND CA.COA_ACCT_CD(+) = MD.COA_ACCT_CD AND CA.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' ORDER BY MD.MAN_JRNL_LINE_NUM
